author: Atlante
long_description:
Message Filtering Mod for Minetest

This mod is designed to enhance the moderation capabilities of your server by providing an efficient way to filter unwanted messages. It helps maintain a friendly and calm environment for all players by automatically blocking inappropriate or banned words.

Available Commands:

> * /ban_word <word>: Adds the specified word to the banned list. Any messages containing this word will be blocked.
* /ban_word_list: Displays the current list of all banned words.
* /ban_word_remove <word>: Removes the specified word from the banned list, allowing its use again.
name: atl_server_filter
short_description: This mod allows you to filter the messages sent in order to maintain calm in your server.
title: Messages Filter
